      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Constructors in types with parameters of type ClassType 
      Constructor and Description
      ConstructorSignature(ClassType clazz, TypeList parameters, ConstructorDeclaration abstractSyntax)
      Constructs a signature for a constructor, given its parameters types and the class it belongs to.
      FieldSignature(ClassType clazz, Type type, java.lang.String name, FieldDeclaration abstractSyntax)
      Constructs the signature of a field with the given type and name, declared in the given class.
      MethodSignature(ClassType clazz, Type returnType, TypeList parameters, java.lang.String name, MethodDeclaration abstractSyntax)
      Constructs the signature of a method with the given name, return type and parameters types.
